comment.author: 90165815@N04
comment._content: Great find for me!. Cleon was my father's uncle. I remember him wel as a child when he visited my grandmother, his sister, in St. Louis.We alsoI visited him once in LaJolla. I will always remember the house on the ocean.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/90165815@N04] Great!  I love hearing stories like this...it makes the all the hard work of digitizing these images worth while!
